1.name: Fighting Style
1.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

1.name: Second Wind
1.description: You have a limited well of stamina. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain HP equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

2.name: Action Surge
2.description: You can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On your turn, you can take one additional action. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

3.name: Martial Archetype
3.description: You choose an archetype that you strive to emulate in your combat styles and techniques: Champion.

3.name: Improved Critical (Champion)
3.description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.
